items.name: Status Between 3ANC Onyx
items.description: Before I got these as a gift, I thought the Airpods Pro was the best wireless earbuds. But these are on a whole different level. The sound quality is amazing, the noise cancellation is great, and the battery life is much better than the Airpods Pro. I use these for everything, from listening to music to taking calls. I highly recommend these.

items.name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro
items.description: I don't update my phone often, so getting the latest iPhone was a big deal for me. I love the camera on this phone and the new 120hz display. Its a much better iPhone 12 Pro Max I had before.
